stringFormatDescription.message:
Format：{FFmpeg Time Format}｜{YouTube Message}｜{YouTube Seconds}｜{Twitch Time Format} 

Format Description： 
1. Give the parameter -ss or -t in FFmpeg to bring in the value. 
> e.g. . \ffmpeg.exe -ss {timestamp} -i input.mp4 -vcodec copy -acodec copy -t {timestamp} -o output.mp4 
2. Used to mark time points in YouTube messages. 
3. Use for bringing in the value of the YouTube URL parameter t. 
> e.g. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v={Video ID}&t={Timestamp}s
4. Give use to bring in the value of the t parameter in the Twitch URL. 
> e.g. https://www.twitch.tv/videos/{Video ID}?t={timestamp}

*For timestamp, please refer to the video on YouTube / Twitch website.

stringEnableOutputLogLabel.message: Output log data to DevTools console.
stringEnableOutputLogLabel.description: String: Output log data to DevTools console.

stringEnableLegacyKeyListenerLabel.message:
Enable legacy key listener.
  Shortcut:
  Record timestamp (Shift + Z)
  Take screenshot (Shift + X)
  Rewind (Shift + S)
  Fast-forward (Shift + D)
  Sync / pause timestamp (Shift + A)
  *Please disabled "Search for text when you start to type".
stringEnableLegacyKeyListenerLabel.description:
